channel.title: Need help/info on server edits and adding things
channel.description:
i am learning fast at this just a few things that kinda catch me off gard and dont wna do it till i know it will work
adding a shop to the source erasedpk i go to save and it wants to save as a text only doc and not keep its original format will the compiler fix that?
